verses.verse: שִׁגָּי֗וֹן <S%H7692><s%> shig-ga-Yon, Shiggaion לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which שָׁ֥ר <S%H7891><s%> shar which he sang לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> div-rei- concerning the words כ֝֗וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Chush, of Cush בֶּן־ ben- יְמִינִֽי׃ <S%H1145><s%> ye-mi-Ni. Benjamite יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> 'E-lo-hai my God בְּךָ֣ be-Cha חָסִ֑יתִי <S%H2620><s%> cha-Si-ti; in thee do I put my trust הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'E-ni save מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all רֹ֝דְפַ֗י <S%H7291><s%> ro-de-Fai, me from all them that persecute וְהַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> ve-hatz-tzi-Le-ni. me and deliver

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- Or יִטְרֹ֣ף <S%H2963><s%> yit-Rof Lest he tear כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <S%H738><s%> ke-'ar-Yeh like a lion נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul פֹּ֝רֵ֗ק <S%H6561><s%> po-Rek, rending [it] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> matz-Tzil. while [there is] none to deliver

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> 'E-lo-hai my God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti if I have done זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; likewise אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- this if there be עָ֥וֶל <S%H5766><s%> 'A-vel iniquity בְּכַפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> be-chap-Pai. in my hands

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If גָּ֭מַלְתִּי <S%H1580><s%> Ga-mal-ti If I have rewarded שֽׁוֹלְמִ֥י <S%H7999><s%> shol-Mi unto him that was at peace רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; evil וָאֲחַלְּצָ֖ה <S%H2502><s%> va-'a-chal-le-Tzah with me (yea I have delivered צוֹרְרִ֣י <S%H6887><s%> tzor-Ri is mine enemy רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> rei-Kam. him that without cause

יִֽרַדֹּ֥ף <S%H7291><s%> yi-rad-Dof persecute אוֹיֵ֨ב׀ <S%H341><s%> o-Yev Let the enemy נַפְשִׁ֡י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul וְיַשֵּׂ֗ג <S%H5381><s%> ve-yas-Seg, and take וְיִרְמֹ֣ס <S%H7429><s%> ve-yir-Mos [it] yea let him tread down לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz upon the earth חַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai; my life וּכְבוֹדִ֓י׀ <S%H3519><s%> u-che-vo-Di mine honour לֶעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> le-'a-Far in the dust יַשְׁכֵּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> yash-Ken and lay סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> ku-Mah Arise יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Pe-cha, in thine anger הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <S%H5375><s%> Hin-na-se lift up בְּעַבְר֣וֹת <S%H5678><s%> be-'av-Rot thyself because of the rage צוֹרְרָ֑י <S%H6887><s%> tzor-Rai; of mine enemies וְע֥וּרָה <S%H5782><s%> ve-'U-rah and awake אֵ֝לַ֗י <S%H410><s%> 'e-Lai, God מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat for me [to] the judgment צִוִּֽיתָ׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ta. [that] thou hast commanded

וַעֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> va-'a-Dat So shall the congregation לְ֭אֻמִּים <S%H3816><s%> Le-'um-mim of the people תְּסוֹבְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5437><s%> te-sov-Ve-ka; compass thee about וְ֝עָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'a-Lei-ha, and over לַמָּר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> lam-ma-Rom thou on high שֽׁוּבָה׃ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vah. for their sakes therefore return

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יָדִ֪ין <S%H1777><s%> ya-Din shall judge עַ֫מִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people שָׁפְטֵ֥נִי <S%H8199><s%> sha-fe-Te-ni judge יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; me O LORD כְּצִדְקִ֖י <S%H6664><s%> ke-tzid-Ki according to my righteousness וּכְתֻמִּ֣י <S%H8537><s%> u-che-tum-Mi and according to mine integrity עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. and

יִגְמָר־ <S%H1584><s%> yig-mor- come to an end נָ֬א <S%H4994><s%> na O רַ֨ע׀ <S%H7451><s%> ra' Oh let the wickedness רְשָׁעִים֮ <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked וּתְכוֹנֵ֪ן <S%H3559><s%> u-te-cho-Nen but establish צַ֫דִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik the just וּבֹחֵ֣ן <S%H974><s%> u-vo-Chen trieth לִ֭בּ֗וֹת <S%H3826><s%> lib-Bot, the hearts וּכְלָי֗וֹת <S%H3629><s%> u-che-la-Yot, and reins אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik. for the righteous

מָֽגִנִּ֥י <S%H4043><s%> ma-gin-Ni My defence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is with אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; [is] of God מ֝וֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> mo-Shi-a', which saveth יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> yish-rei- the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. in heart

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> sho-Fet judgeth צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; the righteous וְ֝אֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> ve-'El, and God זֹעֵ֥ם <S%H2194><s%> zo-'Em is angry בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol every יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> Yom. [with the wicked] every day

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יָ֭שׁוּב <S%H7725><s%> Ya-shuv If he turn חַרְבּ֣וֹ <S%H2719><s%> char-Bo his sword יִלְט֑וֹשׁ <S%H3913><s%> yil-Toosh; not he will whet קַשְׁתּ֥וֹ <S%H7198><s%> kash-To his bow דָ֝רַ֗ךְ <S%H1869><s%> da-Rach, he hath bent וַֽיְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> Vay-chon-Ne-ha. and made it ready

וְ֭לוֹ ve-lo הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> he-Chin He hath also prepared כְּלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> ke-lei- for him the instruments מָ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Ma-vet; of death חִ֝צָּ֗יו <S%H2671><s%> chitz-Tzav, his arrows לְֽדֹלְקִ֥ים <S%H1814><s%> le-do-le-Kim against the persecutors יִפְעָֽל׃ <S%H6466><s%> yif-'Al. he ordaineth

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold יְחַבֶּל־ <S%H2254><s%> ye-chab-bel- Behold he travaileth אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven; with iniquity וְהָרָ֥ה <S%H2029><s%> ve-ha-Rah and hath conceived עָ֝מָ֗ל <S%H5999><s%> 'a-Mal, mischief וְיָ֣לַד <S%H3205><s%> ve-Ya-lad and brought forth שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. falsehood

בּ֣וֹר <S%H953><s%> Bor a pit כָּ֭רָֽה <S%H3738><s%> Ka-rah He made וַֽיַּחְפְּרֵ֑הוּ <S%H2658><s%> vai-yach-pe-Re-hu; and digged וַ֝יִּפֹּ֗ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol, it and is fallen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> be-Sha-chat into the ditch יִפְעָֽל׃ <S%H6466><s%> yif-'Al. [which] he made

יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv shall return עֲמָל֣וֹ <S%H5999><s%> a-ma-Lo His mischief בְרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ve-ro-Sho; upon his own head וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al upon קָ֝דְקֳד֗וֹ <S%H6936><s%> ka-de-ko-Do, upon his own pate חֲמָס֥וֹ <S%H2555><s%> cha-ma-So and his violent יֵרֵֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red. dealing shall come down

אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> o-Deh I will praise יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כְּצִדְק֑וֹ <S%H6664><s%> ke-tzid-Ko; according to his righteousness וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> va-'a-zam-me-Rah, and will sing praise שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- to the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. most high
